title: High-Speed Trains
description: High-speed trains are a very popular and efficient mode of transportation in many parts of the world. This book introduces readers to three types of high- speed trains, including where they came from and how they work. Hop on board for a very fast ride!
highFrequencyWords: axles, convenient, destination, economic, engineer, fossil fuels, fuel efficient, generator, greenhouse gases, network, obstacles, sensors, sustainable, viaducts
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Proper Nouns                : Identify and use proper nouns
awareness: Alphabetizing                : Arrange words in alphabetical order
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
